# Git breakdown
* repository (or repo) - your project folder (hosted on GitHub)
* commit - a snapshot of your repo
* branch - a movable label that points to a commit
* merge - combining two branches
* remote - a computer with the repository on it
* clone - move the repo from the remote for the 1st time
* push - send commits to a remote
* pull - get commits from a remote
* pull request - asking someone to pull your commits into their repo
